---
title: '資料視覺化'
output: html_document
---
```{r}
library(ggplot2)

#單變數:類別型
ggplot(data = quakes, aes(x = stations)) +
  geom_bar(fill = "lightblue", colour = "black")

```
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
#單變數:連續型
ggplot(data = quakes, aes(x = mag)) +
geom_histogram()

```






```{r}
library(ggplot2)
#雙變數
ggplot(data = quakes, aes(x = long, y=depth)) +
  geom_point()

```
